data.description: fix timing, split and join text subtitles
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I chose the root namespace as many seemingly did for their modules
    in "string processing" group
    (http://search.cpan.org/modlist/String_Language_Text_Processing). It
    is not that it does really matter, but IMO the module doesn't fit
    neither in Text:: nor in Parse::, especially if one day it would
    support subtitles in binary formats.
